contextId.occurrenceNote: These are examples of the kinds of things they did and do not indicate what they did to two particular children. Alternate translation: "and did things like trading a boy for a prostitute and selling a girl for wine, so they could drink" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-explicit]])
contextId.glQuote: traded a boy for a prostitute, and sold a girl for wine so they could drink

contextId.occurrenceNote: The people of Israel will leave the places where they were slaves and come back to the land of Israel. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-explicit]])
contextId.glQuote: out of the place where you sold them

contextId.occurrenceNote: The purpose of the gathering is for battle. This can be stated explicitly. Alternate translation: "gather yourselves together for battle" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-explicit]])
